com.izforge.izpack.util
Class MonitorInputStream

java.lang.Object
  com.izforge.izpack.util.MonitorInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MonitorInputStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This is a grabber for stdout and stderr. It will be launched once at command execution end terminates if the apropriate stream runs out of data.

Author:
Olexij Tkatchenko
